doc.author: Jayalakshmi Viswanathan (@jayalakshmiV)
doc.description: This module provides declarative management of L2 interfaces on Extreme Networks EXOS network devices.
notes: This module works with connection C(httpapi). See L(EXOS Platform Options,../network/user_guide/platform_exos.html)

config.description: A dictionary of L2 interfaces options

description: Switchport mode access command to configure the interface as a layer 2 access.
Configure given VLAN in access port. It's used as the access VLAN ID.
Switchport mode trunk command to configure the interface as a Layer 2 trunk.
Native VLAN to be configured in trunk port. It's used as the trunk native VLAN ID.
List of allowed VLANs in a given trunk port. These are the only VLANs that will be configured on the trunk.
The state the configuration should be left in

doc.short_description: Manage L2 interfaces on Extreme Networks EXOS devices.

after.sample:
The configuration returned will always be in the same format
 of the parameters above.

before.description: The configuration prior to the model invocation.
before.sample:
The configuration returned will always be in the same format
 of the parameters above.

requests.description: The set of requests pushed to the remote device.
